ActionStruct.Caption: SFDC - Named agent and Customer Level
SFDC - Named agent and Customer Level

Parameters.string: No agents are available to assist, please try again later.
We appreciate your continued patience. There are {QUEUED} contacts ahead of you... please wait for the next {what} expert.
There are {QUEUED} contacts ahead of you... please wait and a representative will be with you shortly.
You are next in line, please wait...
Hello, my name is Austin, how can I assist you today?
Due to inactivity, I'm going to assume you're done with our chat. If not, please just reach out again. Thank you - Ness

ActionStruct.Caption: Is there anything else I can do to help?

Parameters.string: Is there anything else I can do to help?

ActionStruct.Caption: In your own words, please tell me how I can help. Plan / Penalties / Investment

Parameters.string: In your own words, please tell me how I can help. You can ask me things like, "What is the repaymnent plan on my 401k?" or "What are the penalties for withdrawing early?".

ActionStruct.Caption: Thank you {PatronName}, I'm here to help you.

Parameters.string: Thank you {PatronName}, I'm here to help you.

ActionStruct.Caption: After 60 seconds go to loop 1 time...
Thank you for contacting The Standard. QA language

Parameters.string: Thank you for contacting The Standard. We want to be sure you have a positive experience with us. So this chat session may be recorded for quality assurance.

ActionStruct.Caption: What can I do to help you today?

Parameters.string: What can I do to help you today?

ActionStruct.Caption: My name is Ness. May I have your name please?

Parameters.string: My name is Ness. May I have your name please?
